full_text: There is footage of some SLPP supporters rallying (&having lunch?) INSIDE Temple Trees this morning. Obviously MR & his secretaries were aware & this is clear evidence of the SLPP's involvement w the #ViolenceInColombo, #GotaGoGama+the part the PM's office had with the violence https://t.co/7M4VlRAIXx https://t.co/KC2MFpB2HQ
